title: Sky Car Drift
description: Sky Car Drift is a car drifting game where you must compete drifting against your rivals on a thrilling track above the clouds. Master the art of drifting and aim for the longest drifts without crashing or falling off the edge to earn valuable trophies. Collect trophies to unlock a wide range of cool rewards, including over 200 cars, 120 drivers, 500 emotes, and 10 unique skies. Climb the trophy ladder to gain exclusive titles and showcase your skills. Compete in various drift categories, aim for the top of the leaderboards, and secure your spot in the prestigious hall of fame. Get ready to soar in Sky Car Drift!
